    Summary:

    Is “true” randomness required to share secrets? As it turns out, yes!

    Authors

    Divesh Aggarwal, Eldon Chung, Maciej Obremski, João Ribeiro

    On Secret Sharing, Randomness, and Random-less Reductions for Secret Sharing.
